comment: The set ` ( X C 2 ) ` of double loops of length 2 on a vertex ` X ` is equal to the set of closed walks with length 2 on ` X ` . Considered as "double loops", the first of the two closed walks/loops is degenerated, i.e., has length 0. (Contributed by AV, 18-Feb-2022.) (Revised by AV, 20-Apr-2022.)
